formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Board feet \[ \text{BF}=\frac{T_{\text{in}} \times W_{\text{in}} \times L_{\text{ft}}}{12} \] Equivalently, volume in cubic feet is \( \text{CF} = \dfrac{T_{\text{in}} \times W_{\text{in}} \times L_{\text{in}}}{1728} \), and \( 1 \ \text{CF} = 12 \ \text{BF} \). Cubic meters: \( \text{m}^3=\text{CF}\times 0.0283168466 \). Kerf-aware stock length \[ L_{\text{req}}=\sum_i n_i\,\ell_i + (N_{\text{cuts}}\times k) + (2\,N_{\text{boards}}\times t) \] where \(k\) is kerf, \(t\) end-trim per board, and \(N_{\text{cuts}}\) equals the total number of separating cuts.
